testimonials.name: Cody Kader - Peer
testimonials.testimonial: Amy is a determined and passionate web developer with a kind demeanor.She excels in delivering high-quality work and collaborates seamlessly in both team and individual settings. With strong skills in HTML,CSS and Javascript, she willingly supports her peers, fostering a positive and productive work environment

testimonials.name: Abdoelmaalik Samaai - Peer
testimonials.testimonial: She is an exceptionally compassionate, kind-hearted, and caring individual, attributes that greatly contribute to her success in web development. With a determined focus on her goals, she consistently exhibits a strong work ethic. She excels in problem-solving, persistently seeking innovative solutions. She fearlessly seeks advice when needed and consistently strives for self improvement.

testimonials.name: Kgodisho Lebopa - Peer
testimonials.testimonial: I have been impressed by Amy's commitment to learning and growing as a coder. She has a natural talent for problem-solving and has already demonstrated proficiency in the work she does. I highly recommend Amy to any organization seeking a motivated developer.

testimonials.name: Kamvelihle Sikalana - Peer
testimonials.testimonial: Amy is proficient in HTML, CSS and JavaScript. She is a reliable and good team player in group related projects, and has a hunger to learn more

testimonials.name: Jason Viljoen - Peer
testimonials.testimonial: For the 6 months that I have worked with Amy, she has shown a lot of promise in the work place and class setup. Always lending  a helping hand where needed, even having the class lecturer asking her for her help and insight. A very bright individual and ready to take on any task put in front of her.

testimonials.name: Seth Kallis - Mentor
testimonials.testimonial: Amy is dedicated, hard working and a team player. He works well his peers and performs well on his projects. He has a good understanding of web development and would be a valuable addition to any team that is lucky enough to have him.
